name: the amazing adventure of red & blue
name_original: the amazing adventure of red & blue
description: Two strange soft, ball shaped creatures find themselves in a strange empty place with a mysterious man in a suit and a top hat. Out of nowhere, a young looking boy pops out of a dimensional rift confronting the man and then taking the two creatures somewhat forcefully with him. Where will they end up now? What are that boy's intentions? Who is the mysterious handsome man?
